name: AIMLESS
description:
AIMLESS An entry to the 48 hour GMTK Game Jam 2020 by Jack Pavey

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move the player around. Double click ENTER to go back to the main menu from in-game.

Weapon firing is automatic.

Do your best to stay alive against hoards of enemies but be careful, you have lost the ability to aim your weapon! Dodge and weave between enemies and bullets and see how long you can survive!

There are 4 separate enemies unlocked by reaching higher levels, try and find them all!
